title: Analyzing Your Business Digital Footprints
description: Overview of client digital presence including domain information and status assessment
tooltip:
TABLE: clients.json + client_ai_profiles.json
FILTER: clientCode = selected
OUTPUT: name, mainDomain, businessOverview, products, targetSegments, geographies

title: Top 10 Searched Keywords in India
description: Shows top 10 keywords by search volume in India with balloon visualization
tooltip:
TABLE: keyword_api_data.json
FILTER: clientCode = selected, locationCode = 2356 (India)
SORT: searchVolume DESC
OUTPUT: Top 10 keywords with volume as balloons

title: Top 10 Searched Keywords in Global
description: Shows top 10 keywords by search volume globally with balloon visualization
tooltip:
TABLE: keyword_api_data.json
FILTER: clientCode = selected, locationCode = 2840 (Global)
SORT: searchVolume DESC
OUTPUT: Top 10 keywords with volume as balloons

title: Top 20 Searched Keywords in India and World
description: Shows top 20 keywords by search volume from both India and Global locations
tooltip:
TABLE: keyword_api_data.json
FILTER: clientCode = selected, location = India OR Global
SORT: searchVolume DESC
OUTPUT: Top 20 deduplicated keywords with volume

title: Client Top Keywords in India and Global with Volume and Ranking
description: Summary of Top 3 and Top 10 keyword rankings for client domains
tooltip:
TABLE: domain_keywords.json
FILTER: clientCode = selected, domain IN client.domains (normalized), position 1-10
BUCKETS: Top 3 (pos 1-3), Top 10 (pos 4-10) for India + Global
OUTPUT: Summary counts + Top 5 India + Top 5 Global by volume

title: Keywords Where Client is Absent
description: High-volume keywords where competitors rank but client is missing from Top 10
tooltip:
TABLE: client_positions.json + keyword_api_data.json
FILTER: clientCode = selected, position = "-" (absent) OR position > 10
SORT: volume DESC
OUTPUT: Top 10 keywords with highest volume

* We should have used domain_keywords, but the data is not ready as there are many irrelevant keywords that exist.

title: Client Vs Competitor Strength
description: Client domains and top 5 Main Competitors with importance scores
tooltip:
TABLE: clients.json + competitors.json
FILTER: competitionType = "Main Competitor", isActive = true
SORT: importanceScore DESC
OUTPUT: Client domains (score=100) + Top 5 competitors

SCORE DEFINITION: The score (0-100) represents the competitive strength based on keyword overlap, ranking positions, and domain authority. Client domains always get score=100 as baseline.

title: Market Size - Keyword Volume Share
description: Client vs Competitor keyword volume share based on domain_keywords table
tooltip:
TABLE: domain_keywords.json
FORMULA WITH CTR MODEL:
A) Total Market Volume = Sum of unique keyword search volumes
B) Client Volume = Sum of unique keyword volumes for client domains
C) Client Traffic = Sum of (Volume × CTR) based on ranking position
D) Traffic % = C/A × 100

CTR MODEL:
Pos 1=30%, Pos 2=17.5%, Pos 3=12%, Pos 4=8%, Pos 5=6%
Pos 6=4%, Pos 7=3%, Pos 8=2%, Pos 9=1.5%, Pos 10=1%
Pos 11-15=0.5%, Pos 16-20=0.3%, Pos 21+=~0%

Click CTR? link on dashboard to see full model.

title: Domain-wise Organic Traffic (ETV) Comparison
description: Compare ETV between client domains (Self) and Main Competitors with India/Global breakdown
tooltip:
TABLES: competitors.json + domain_overview.json
ETV = Estimated Traffic Value ($ value of organic traffic based on equivalent Google Ads cost)
Formula: ETV = Σ (Keyword Traffic × Keyword CPC)

Shows:
• Self domains (client) with light blue highlight
• Main Competitor domains
• ETV for India, Global, and Total
• Keyword counts for India and Global

Higher ETV = more valuable organic presence.

title: Keyword Opportunity & Risk Matrix
description: Classify keywords by ranking position and volume percentile to prioritize SEO actions
tooltip:
TABLE: domain_keywords.json
FILTER: clientCode = selected, position > 0

MATRIX LOGIC:
• Rank Buckets: Top (1-10), Medium (11-30), Low (31+)
• Volume Buckets: High (≥P70), Low (<P70) calculated per dataset

OPPORTUNITY TYPES:
• Defensive/Core Asset (Top+High) → Critical priority
• Low-Hanging Fruit (Medium+High) → Very High priority
• Strategic/Long-Term (Low+High) → Medium-High priority
• Secondary Opportunity (Medium+Low) → Medium priority
• Stable/Low Risk (Top+Low) → Low priority
• Ignore/Deprioritize (Low+Low) → No action

title: Brand Power Analysis
description: Compare brand strength between Self and Main Competitor domains
tooltip:
TABLE: domain_keywords.json + AI Term Dictionary
FILTER: Keywords containing terms with bucket=brand from AI Keyword Builder

MATRIX LOGIC:
• Rank Buckets: Top (1-10), Medium (11-30), Low (31+)
• Volume Buckets: High (≥P25), Low (<P25) - Top 25% threshold

BRAND KEYWORDS: Keywords containing brand terms like company names, product lines etc.
